thread.title: APNewsBreak: Top Biden aide lays out potential 2016 platform
thread.title_full: APNewsBreak: Top Biden aide lays out potential 2016 platform - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: APNewsBreak: Top Biden aide lays out potential 2016 platform
text: One of Vice President Joe Biden's top political advisers says he'll make a decision soon about whether to run for president. Former Delaware Sen. Ted Kaufman is one of Biden's closest aides. He's telling former Biden staffers in a letter that Biden will need help from all of them if he runs. The emailed letter was sent to former staffers Thursday and obtained by The Associated Press. Kaufman says he doesn't know if Biden will run. He says Biden's top consideration is his family's welfare. Kaufman says if Biden runs, it will be because of his "burning conviction" that the U.S. must fundamentally change the balance in the economy. He says Biden would run to help the middle class restore its ability to get ahead.
